title: Kirk Minihane Christmas Spectacular, ft. Brandi Love
description:
Kirk Minihane has told his children they will no longer be attending Hogwarts now that Harry Potter author J.K. Rowling has revealed herself to be a crude bigot. The KMS crew reacts to last nights boring Democratic Party debate (17:20). Minihane's old partner dropped another episode in the "slow rollout" of his podcast, and this time he decided to take a few shots at KMS; Kirk ain't happy (25:00). Adult film star and MILF extraordinaire Brandi Love joins the show to respond to conservative anti-porn blogger Matt Walsh and spread a little Christmas cheer (53:00). Kirk, Mike, and Steve play sound from the past year, make predictions for the coming year, and reflect on the magical journey they've shared together.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
